channel.title: [ESPEON]How do i change welcome message [508]
channel.description:
Hi im using ESPEON server and its really different files compared to paladino76 servers now i just want to change welcome message ive asked many times noone seems to be helping.
Places ive checked for Welcome Message- Action Sender Player Rs2Login Protocol
Login.Java- There is no Login.java on this one
P.s - Dont post if you dont no?

item.title: [ESPEON]How do i change welcome message [508]
item.dc:creator: @dipz4lyfe dipz4lyfe
item.description:
@dipz4lyfe wrote:

src/net/com/espeon/test/testworldloader. and you’ll see

getOwner().getActionSender().sendMessage(getOwner(), “<img=1>[!Welcome To whatever you server is and so on]”); Edit those and once ur done. COMPLILE it, which is Bin/Build

Hope it works.

Read full topic
